It seems either Google Play Service YouTube app is not installed in your device, please check. It is essential

One App for all kinds of Odia News Papers and Magazines. This app aggregates on Odia News Source in one app, we do not own or have any kind of legal relationship with any news agencies. We do not host any news, all news are hosted in owners website. 
We’ve made all attempts to add all available news papers. If we have left anything, please send us a mail, we’ll add it immediately. Please refer our privacy policy to know more. 
If you are a news agency and you want your news paper to be removed, please write to us with proof that you are the authorised person, we’ll remove immediately.


Thank You 
Development Team
Are you searching for any Odia Magazine or News Paper, this app has everything, must try now.
